description: This file defines a Move class representing a chess move, including source and destination squares and optional promotion piece type. It provides methods for accessing move attributes and normalizing inputs.

classes.name: Move
classes.description: A simple representation of a chess move with source, destination, and optional promotion piece.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Constructor to create a move with source, destination, and optional promotion.

methods.name: getFrom
methods.description: Returns the source square of the move.

methods.name: getTo
methods.description: Returns the destination square of the move.

methods.name: getPromotion
methods.description: Returns the promotion piece type if any.

methods.name: normalizeSquare
methods.description: Converts a square notation to lowercase and validates its format.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the move, e.g., 'e2-e4' or 'e7-e8=QUEEN'.
